data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gomez, Samuel, Diaz, Karen (2017): On some new species of Ancorabolidae Sars, 1909 from the Gulf of California: the genera Ceratonotus Sars, 1909, and Dendropsyllus Conroy-Dalton, 2003 (Crustacea, Copepoda, Harpacticoida). ZooKeys 657: 43-65, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.657.10725, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.657.10725
